# Calendar.Component.month

**Case**

Identifier for the month unit.

## Declaration

```swift
case month
```

## Specifying Years and Months

- **Calendar.Component.era**: Identifier for the era unit.
- **Calendar.Component.year**: Identifier for the year unit.
- **Calendar.Component.yearForWeekOfYear**: Identifier for the week-counting year unit.
- **Calendar.Component.quarter**: Identifier for the quarter of the calendar.
